      • TokenManager

        public TokenManager()

    • Method Detail

      • sendTokenByEmail

        public void sendTokenByEmail​(Token token,
                             String recipient)
                      throws javax.mail.MessagingException
        Finalize initialization of the token and send it to the recipient.

        As the plain token is not stored in the database, the token is regenerated in this method.

        Parameters:
        token - the token to send
        recipient - recipient email address
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - if sending the message fails

      • consume

        public Token consume​(Long id,
                     String plainToken)
        Consume the token
        Parameters:
        id - id of the token to consume
        plainToken - the plain secret token as sent by e-mail
        Returns:
        the consumed token
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - notFound if the token does not exists; badRequest if token does not match; authenticationRequired if token requires authentication but current user id not

      • getOrCreateVerifyAccountToken

        public VerifyLocalAccountToken getOrCreateVerifyAccountToken​(LocalAccount account)
        Create or update a validation token.

        If a validate token already exists for the given account, it will be update so there is never more than one validation token per localAccount.

        Parameters:
        account - token owner
        Returns:
        a brand new token or a refresh

      • requestEmailAddressVerification

        public void requestEmailAddressVerification​(LocalAccount account,
                                            boolean failsOnError)
        Send a "Please verify your email address" message.
        Parameters:
        account - account to verify
        failsOnError - if false, silent SMTP error
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - smtpError if there is a SMPT error AND failsOnError is set to true messageError if the message contains errors (eg. malformed addresses)

      • sendResetPasswordToken

        public void sendResetPasswordToken​(LocalAccount account,
                                   boolean failsOnError)
        Send a "Click here the reset your password" message.
        Parameters:
        account - The account whose password is to be reset
        failsOnError - if false, silent SMTP error
        Throws:
        ch.colabproject.colab.generator.model.exceptions.HttpErrorMessage - smtpError if there is a SMPT error AND failsOnError is set to true messageError if the message contains errors (eg. malformed addresses)

      • sendMembershipInvitation

        public TeamMember sendMembershipInvitation​(Project project,
                                           String recipient)
        Send invitation to join the project team to the recipient.
        Parameters:
        project - the project to join
        recipient - email address to send invitation to
        Returns:
        the pending teamMember of null if none was sent

      • deleteInvitationsByTeamMember

        public void deleteInvitationsByTeamMember​(TeamMember teamMember)
        Delete all invitations linked to the team member
        Parameters:
        teamMember - the team member for which we delete all invitations

      • getNotExpiredToken

        public Token getNotExpiredToken​(Long id)
        Fetch token with given id from DAO. If it's outdated, it will be destroyed and null will be returned
        Parameters:
        id - id of the token
        Returns:
        token if it exists and is not outdated, null otherwise
